creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: tall abstracted rooster; gold and black zigzagging feather motif down back and lower front; red comb at top with organic black and gold details; squinting eyes
markings: abstract mark engraved on back near upper center
medium: Lacquer, hemp cloth, gold powder, and glass
title: Kai-sao—The Hen Who Conceived a Child
